replies.body: Time to spam {{champion:33}}  in jungle lmao.

and now he gets one of the best skins in the game, (hopefully this will cause everyone to play him, causing a huge feedback loop of complaints and cause a nerf)

i personally will play yi when the skin comes out, because i hate yi but love the skin.
How to counter Yi, After he uses his supposed over powered q siphoning Strike. stun or silence him so he can't run away or use his ult or meditation and then kill him. Easy same as Katarina
My team got aced, Yi respawned and got a penta. qqqqq
